name: Glaive
description: Battle monsters of the darkness with a kinetic blade! Intense combat and blade throwing action in adrenaline inducing VR! Skirmish through progressive levels of challenge and adversity to find ultimate victory or your fatal demise.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better Storage: 1200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: I finished on normal in under an hour. Hard mode seems to ramp the challenge up. It's not an endless wave shooter, there is a final boss at the end. Fun game, good price.  Edit: Finished hard mode in about 2 hrs. Definitely gave me a workout.
